name: The Blind Man
description:
The Blind Man

The man was lost. He had been for some time.

Navigating through a world you can't see is a challenge in itself. When the world is unfamiliar, full of crates and switches, and the occasional leap of faith, that challenge can seem insurmountable.

This short game challenges players to experience the world from a new perspective. Players have limited information of the world around them. Solutions are often discovered. Patience and perseverance can go a long way.

Controls:

A/D - Move left/right

Space - Jump

X - Interact

R - Restart Level

Esc - Pause/Quit

Created as part of the Game Design and Development Capstone.

All sounds recorded using iPhone 5S.
